mapper.select: select m.perms from sys_user_role ur LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu rm on ur.role_id = rm.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_menu m on rm.menu_id = m.menu_id where ur.user_id = #{userId}
select user_id from sys_user where parent_id = #{value}
select * from sys_user u left join sys_user_role sur on u.user_id=sur.user_id where sur.role_id=4
select user_id from sys_user a left join tb_leads b on a.user_id=b.parent_id where b.id=#{leadsId}
select a.*,c.role_name roleName from sys_user a left join sys_user_role b on a.user_id=b.user_id left join sys_role c on b.role_id=c.role_id
